product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsJelly Pop Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMelt away makeup with e.l.f. Cosmetics Jelly Pop Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm, featuring the one-in-a-melon scent you e.l.f.ing love. This luxe solid makeup remover cleansing balm transforms into a milky oil that rinses off clean, easily removing makeup and leaving your skin feeling silky smooth.
details: DetailsBenefitsLimited-edition makeup remover balm easily removes cosmeticsTransforms from a luxe solid balm to a milky oil that rinses off cleanLeaves skin feeling silky smooth and softe.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETAe.l.f. is proud to partner with Fair Trade USA and manufacture products in Fair Trade Certified facilities. Look for the Fair Trade Certified seal on your e.l.f. product!FeaturesSubtle and refreshing watermelon scentFormulated WithoutPhthalates, Parabens, Nonylphenol Ethoxylates, Triclosan, TriclocarbanItem 2642450How To UseScoop out a small amount of balm with the included spatula and massage onto dry skin, ensuring eyes are closed.Rinse with water or remove with a warm, damp cloth.IngredientsCetyl Ethylhexanoate, Triethylhexanoin, Hydrogenated Polydecene, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Synthetic Wax, PEG-10 Isostearate, Water (Aqua), Fragrance (Parfum), Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Phytosphingosine, Polysorbate 20, Cholesterol, Xanthan Gum, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Ceramide EOP, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool.Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: Scoop out a small amount of balm with the included spatula and massage onto dry skin, ensuring eyes are closed.Rinse with water or remove with a warm, damp cloth.
ingredients: Linalool.Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product

reviews.headline: Definitely Delivers!
reviews.comments: I love the ELF Makeup Meliting Cleansing Balm!  It works great -- it truly feels like it is melting the makeup off.  It does not irritate my skin or my eyes at all.  Even tough mascara and "long-lasting" formulas come off easily.  the Jelly Pop scent is a bonus.  HIGHLY recommend!

reviews.headline: Will not buy again
reviews.comments: Was not a fan of the smell. I'll stick to the original.

reviews.headline: game changer
reviews.comments: i've been loyal to green clean since it's the only cleansing balm that's worked for me â€” until now! went on a whim to try this for the fun scent and it works SO WELL, for a fraction of the price of competitors!! plus smells so yummy. super happy with this purchase

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: This product gets rid of makeup so fast! It smells amazing! Literally melts your makeup away! Game changer!

reviews.headline: It's a good product
reviews.comments: It's not really sticky in the sense that you don't feel it after you wash your face and it smells really nice

reviews.headline: Hydrating butâ€¦
reviews.comments: Product is hydrating to my skin however wish it wouldn't just slightly smudge the makeup off to the point of requiring a very thorough, deep face wash afterâ€¦

media.headline: Amazingly makeup remover! Even waterproof ones
media.caption: Effective makeup remover!

media.headline: Great performance in a small punch!
media.caption: Me holding the product to highlight applicator

media.headline: I love it, best remover ever
media.caption: The best remover and applicator

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this product for free from bzzagent. It works great. I use exactly as directed. Scoop out a small amount with the included spatula onto dry skin and rub in. Then I splash water on my face until it's all cleaned off. Some extra gentle rubbing on waterproof makeup areas with warm water does the trick. I like the included scooper. However, the scent is very artificial and sweet like candy. I really don't enjoy it. Will continue to use the product as I can look past this and it didn't cause breakouts which is the most important. I don't have very sensitive skin in general. Would recommend if you're not sensitive to fragrance.
faceoff_positive.headline: Works great, smells meh

faceoff_negative.comments: I've been using this daily for over a week and it melts like butter the second it's in your hand. I would love it more if the smell wasn't so strong but it effectively removes both my eye makeup and liquid foundation.It's similar to other brand name melting balms I have tried but this melts better than most and my sensitive skin doesn't get irritated by regular use(even being heavily fragranced). I recommend using a fair amount if you wear heavy eye makeup though.
faceoff_negative.headline: Like not love

rollup.name: Jelly Pop Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
